RelatedSentence: The new Godzilla was an unqualified success this past weekend , earning over $ 200 million globally and kicking off development of a sequel .

Most people think of Godzilla as a camp testament to cheap special effects and terrible dubbing , but the new film sidesteps those impressions by adopting a more grounded , earnest tone , calling back to the 1954 Japanese original that used the creature to express nuclear fears in post-World War II Japan .
